_header: When I o the Rood see
_description: On the Passion — one l2-line stanza

Bod57.First Lines:
Vyen i o þe rode seffaste nailed to þe
                    tre…
Bod57.Last Lines: …An neb wit teres wetteȝif I of lowe kan
